name: A Memory Myth
overview: A Memory Myth is a 1-player educational game for the Apple II. The goal is to chase Rumpelstiltskin away by correctly and quickly answering logic questions. The player is briefly shown a 5 character digit. The player must retype it, or make rearrangements to the characters based upon the challenge. As the player answers questions, they refill the letters for the name Rumpelstiltskin. Each time they spell the name, they chase the gnome further away. The level of difficulty defines the time the player has to answer.
